attributes.action: allow guns for Olympic hopefuls to practice, they are not killers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Guns for legitimate sport should not be banned people kill, not guns or knives

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/TargetPistols/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
